turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Hello there.  How are you today?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: im good.how about you?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I'm doing well, thank you.  Unfortunately for many children in the U.S. and abroad, things aren't as pleasant.  Are you aware of the non-profit Save the Children?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: oh yeah. my wife is a social worker way back to the philippines and that is one of her job

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Excellent.  In that case then you are aware of the suffering many children are enduring due to food shortages, natural disasters, and war zones.  There are kids sleeping in the streets even here in the U.S.  These kids need our help. Fortunately, there is something we can do about it.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: yeah the Government have to do something to help the children having their safe place to live

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I completely agree.  Sadly, most government agencies that are supposed to provide this support are often staffed by corrupt or greedy management.  This leaves the task to our non-profits to help as many children as possible.  Would you like to know more about Save the Children?  Any questions I can answer?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: oh yeah im agree with that. but as an individual we can still help them thru giving them food something like that and or try calling the social welfare office to help the street children by having a safe shelter on there place

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Indeed we can!  And every action counts when it comes to these kids' quality of life.  While we can work individually toward our goal, it is often helpful to work with others toward a common goal.  That is where non-profits like Save the Children comes into play.  Would you mind if I were to give you a couple short facts about our organization?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: nope but thanks anyway

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Well I am disappointed a bit by your decision.  You know, Save the Children uses over 85% of its funding directly providing for suffering kids.  Would you help with even a small donation of $1?  Surely that isn't too much to ask?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: ahmmp but how?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: "The research team will collect all donations and send it to Save the Children."

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: oh yeah am willing to gave $1 but how can i do that?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: How much do you like to donate to the charity now? Your donation will be directly deducted from your task payment. You can choose any amount from $0 to all your payment ($2)  If you want to give $1 you have that option. It comes out of your HIT payment.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: just a $1 is that okay?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: That would be a blessing for needy kids!  I'm so glad you have decided to donate!  Let me give you one last disclaimer and we can set up your donation of $1 ok?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: oh i see okay

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: If you need more information you can navigate to  URL and see all the information available.  Thank you again for giving!

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: you're welcome and God bless!

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Thank you for your $1 donation! Have a good evening :)
